      • contents

        public ReaderResourceBuilder contents(Object... contents)
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the contents for this resource.

        This method can be called multiple times to add more content.

        Parameters:
        contents - The resource contents.
        If multiple contents are specified, the results will be concatenated.
        Contents can be any of the following:
        • InputStream
        • Reader - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • File
        • CharSequence - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • header

        public ReaderResourceBuilder header(String name,
                                    Object value)
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies an HTTP response header value.
        Parameters:
        name - The HTTP header name.
        value - The HTTP header value.
        Will be converted to a String using Object.toString().
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • headers

        public ReaderResourceBuilder headers(Map<String,Object> headers)
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies HTTP response header values.
        Parameters:
        headers - The HTTP headers.
        Values will be converted to Strings using Object.toString().
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
